name: Vineet Shukla
body:
Download as PDF
###Professional Skills ![Professional Skills](https://raw.github.com/vineets/vineetshukla.github.io/gh-pages/Skills.png) ###Professional Highlights * Experience delivering products from ideation phase in both web & mobile space on latest concepts * Experience executing visioning exercises with multiple stakeholders at different levels (both internal and external) * Experience working closely with SMEs to develop products * Experience working on large scale distributed agile projects * Proven ability to collaborate with multiple stakeholders across different departments * Experience consulting clients and internal teams on agile practices and product roadmap * Experience managing both T&M and Fixed Price projects * Proven PM skills: from creating project plans to leading teams, consistently meeting deadlines and delivering business values * Passion for keeping up with emerging trends * Experience in managing opportunities (pre-sales activities) from different regions * Experience working with start-ups, SMEs and large corporations * Experience working in multiple countries (US, UK, India, Brazil & Singapore) ###Experience ![Experience](https://raw.github.com/vineets/vineetshukla.github.io/gh-pages/Exp.png) ###Educational Qualifications PGDMM: Bangalore University
MSc. IT: Kuvempu University
BCA: Bangalore University
###Passport details Passport Number: F3175101
Passport Expiry Date: 15th June 2015
Have valid B1 and UK ICT Tier 2 visas
###Contact details: Mobile: +91 8800618822
Email id: vineet.shukla1@gmail.com
D-5/8. Ground Floor
DLF Exclusive Floors. DFL Phase 5
Gurgaon - 122002
